All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
CssPatcher
Little helper class to add an internal css definition to the SVG file that prevents manual selection of any text objects by the user.
DimensionPatcher
Little helper class to boost svg dimensions to 5000x5000, regardless of original size.
FunctionReferencePatcher
Helper class that adds additional script referencer tags as main nodes (one level below root).
IdPatcher
ID patcher extension.
Patcher
Abstract base class for all patchers.
SvgPatcher
Code based on the example by mkyong: https://mkyong.com/java/how-to-read-xml-file-in-java-dom-parser/
XmlInputOutputUtils
Util class to handle import of xml filed from disk.
XmlNodelistIteratorTools
Helper tool to provide foreach support for xml nodelists.
